questionText.text:
Create security tool kit (checklist software) for all your computing devices:
  1. Anti software - Laptop (Windows / Linux), Mobile (Android / iOS / Windows phone)
  2. Anti spyware (anti malware) - Laptop (Windows / Linux), Mobile (Android / iOS / Windows phone)
  3. Personal firewall - Laptop (Windows / Linux), Mobile (Android / iOS / Windows phone)
  4. Browser, and browser plug-ins for blocking ads, for blocking cookies.
  5. Backup tool kit - for backing up files
  6. Personal crypto toolkit - for encrypting directories and files.
  7. Necessary browser settings
  8. Necessary privacy settings inside social media
  9. File sharing software - Laptop (Windows / Linux), Mobile (Android / iOS / Windows phone)
  10. Other specialized security software Optional tools like blocking USBs, keyloggers,photo sharing applications, personal proxy, VPN software, packet sniffer, password manager etc.

Hints: You need to identify tool is relevant for your computing environment
Deliverables: Demonstrate to your mentor your checklist, along with a report on why you choose specific tools for your checklist. Submit a zip file of your submission in LMS
Evaluation Criteria: This module is evaluated for 10 marks. Following is breakup:
1. Identifying appropriate tools for all computing devices - 5 marks.
2. Documenting tools and uses, creating report - 5 marks.
